version_description:
If you like Transcribe Live, please let colleagues and friends know about it. This version:
▪ Fixed a bug in which the transcription would not work for some users.
▪ Made transcription credit purchase screen easier to follow and scroll.

This version:
▪ Fixes a bug where the text does not initially show up for some users.

This version:
▪ Improves screen fonts and colors
▪ Fixes a bug affecting some users when moving to a new device.

This version does some nice things:
▪ It fixes a problem on our transcription server.
▪ It improves playback of transcriptions in while in the background
I hope you like these improvements. Feedback is always welcome: info@eventomatic.io

This version makes some improvements:
▪ It fixes a problem with speaker detection.
▪ It improves transcriptions in some languages.
I hope you like these improvements. Feedback is always welcome: info@eventomatic.io

This version improves transcription and recording features. Feedback is always welcome: info@eventomatic.io
If you like Transcribe Live, please leave us a review in the app store. It helps a lot.

This version improves transcription and recording features. Feedback is always welcome: info@eventomatic.io
If you like Transcribe Live, please leave us a review in the app store. It helps a lot.
